channel.title: 4 free steam games for nvidia users
channel.description:
[s]For a limited time[/s][sup]1[/sup], Steam gamers who have an NVIDIA graphics card can get 4 games for free:
http://www.steampowered.com/nvidia/
[sup]1[/sup]: Niall just told me this was there since '06 lel. Oh well, good for people who never knew about it (like me a few minutes ago).

item.title: 4 free steam games for nvidia users
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

You get Lost Coast and Deathmatch with an ATi Graphics Card, and I thought Peggle Extreme got made free now anyway ?

http://www.steampowered.com/ati_offer1a/

Read full topic
item.source: 4 free steam games for nvidia users
